sections.heading: safety answering point, defined
sections.text: Public safety answering point means a local governmental entity responsible for receiving 911 calls and processing those calls according to a specific operational policy.SourceLaws 2016, LB938, ยง 22;R.S.1943, (2024), ยง 86-1022;Laws 2025, LB362, ยง 34.Effective Date: Se
